column1: Relatives and friends are invited to the viewing and funeral on Monday
column3: 2015 from 8 to 10 AM at the LeRoy P. Wooster Funeral Home & Crematory
column4: 441 White horse Pike in Atco. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at 10:30 AM at Christ the Redeemer Parish
column6: 318 Carl Hasselhan Drive in Atco. Interment will be private.
